label: classification
comment: A code representing the product's class, typically using the UN CPC (United Nations Central Product Classification) https://unstats.un.org/unsd/classifications/Econ/cpc

rangeIncludes.comment: A classification scheme and code / name representing a category value for a product, entity, or facility.

domainIncludes.comment: The ProductInformation class encapsulates detailed information regarding a specific product, including its identification details, manufacturer, and other pertinent details.
